data.oai_dc:dc: Assemblage of total living benthic foraminifera in sediment core SO117_MC469

24/03, Adercotryma glomerata, Allogromides sp., Ammobaculites agglutinans, Anomalina sp., Arabian Sea, Aschemonella sp., Astrononion echolsi, Bathysiphon sp., BIGSET, Biogeochemical Fluxes of Matter and Energy in the Deep Sea, Bolivina pygmaea, Buliminella sp., Cibicidoides sp., Counting >30 µm fraction, Cribrostomoides subglobosum, DEPTH, sediment/rock, Epistominella pusilla, Eponides tenera, Foraminifera, benthic agglutinated indeterminata, Foraminifera, benthic calcareous indeterminata, Fursenkoina spp., Hippocrepina indivisa, Hoeglundina elegans, Hormosina distans, Hormosina globulifera, Hormosina sp., JGOFS-IN-1, Lagenammina difflugiformis, Lenticulina spp., Melonis barleeanus, Miliolinella oblonga, MUC, MultiCorer, Nonionella bradyi, Nonionella spp., Nouria polymorphinoides, Nuttallides rugosa, Oridorsalis cf. umbonatus, Oridorsalis umbonatus, Osangularia culter, Pullenia bulloides, Pullenia salisburyi, Reophax bilocularis, Reophax horrida, Reophax scorpiurus, Reophax spp., Rhabdammina, Rhizammina algaeformis, Saccorhiza ramosa, SO117, SO117_MC469, Sonne, Trochammina inflata, Trochammina sp. cf. Alveolophragmium wiesneri, Uvigerina hispida, Uvigerina peregrina
